Instruction: Preheat the broiler in the oven and adjust the oven rack to be about 6 inches from the heat source.
Cut pineapple into quarters and remove the core. Separate each section from the skin and arrange on a baking sheet. Sprinkle each slice with 2 tablespoons each of brown sugar and coconut.
Toast the coconut under the broiler for about 5 minutes or until lightly browned.
